programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: With New Orleans decorated for Halloween, the team investigates the murder of a naval staff Judge Advocate found in a cemetery dressed in a Victorian costume with vampiric puncture wounds on her neck. Meanwhile, the team debates Halloween night activity.Guests: Paige Turco, Steven Weber..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a navy officer with the highest level top secret clearance who was recently assigned as a tech liaison with a private developer. Also, Pride transforms the carport into an auto shop.Guests: Daryl Mitchell..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a petty officer found in a Mardi Gras float storage facility with an engagement ring and proposal plan in hand. However, the case takes a mysterious turn when the team is unable to locate his supposed girlfriend.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Reeling from the loss of their son Chris, Piper and Leo must attend a Hindu wedding.Guests: Nick Lachey..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A student at the Magic School inadvertently conjures up Lady Godiva and Lord Dyson.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Against Piper's wishes, Paige and Phoebe summon Grams for Chris's wiccaning.Guests: Nick Lachey..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige falls victim to a spell that causes her to age; Leslie rigs the dating contest.Guests: Nick Lachey..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a stolen navy-issued gun is found to belong to a Chief Petty officer who died 40 years ago, the team reopens the cold case, one that Wade has tracked and investigated for years. Also, the team prepares for their annual Thanksgiving dinner together.Guests: Steven Weber, Dean Stockwell..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a retired SEAL who tracked down individuals impersonating military personnel. But the case takes a mysterious turn when the lead suspect is found with the Navy issued jacket of an officer killed in Afghanistan.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates a deadly explosion at the Navy-Marine Corps Relief Gala event they were attending. They discover that Pride was the intended target of the bomb.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a navy Admiral's daughter is the prime suspect in double murders aboard a research boat, the team partners with the Coast Guard Investigative Service to work the case. Meanwhile, Lasalle tracks down his estranged brother.Guests: Diane Neal..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A navy lieutenant commander in impeccable shape turns to Pride and the team to solve his imminent murder after discovering he has been poisoned with a lethal dose of radiation.Guests: Diane Neal..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: While trying to determine the identity of a Jane Doe, Brennan is shocked to learn the remains are those of her mother who went missing with her father 15 years ago. After years of uncertainty, Brennan finally has confirmation of her mother's death.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate the site of a train wreck where the bodies of a senator and a businessman are found within the wreckage. The businessman's body is found in a car on the train tracks, and at first glance, it is an apparent suicide.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: After one of the men who killed his wife and daughter is set free, Clyde Shelton takes justice into his own hands and begins taking out everyone that was connected to the case.

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Oliver returns to the mayor's office and faces one of his most pressing issues yet: the forced release of dozens of violent criminals prosecuted by Adrian Chase. Meanwhile, a crate is delivered to Oliver's office containing a mysterious corpse.

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Black Siren returns to help Chase. Felicity organizes a birthday party for Oliver, while Lance is furious with Rene.Guests: Katie Cassidy..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After an NCIS agent is killed during security detail for the Vice Chief of Naval Operations, the team must determine if this was assassination or if someone is targeting one of their own. Meanwhile, Agent Brody is placed under investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Petty Officer is found murdered in the midst of Mardi Gras events, the team investigates what parades and parties led to his untimely death. Also, Pride must decide what aspects of his strained relationship with his father he is willing to share.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Navy recruiter is the target of a lethal hit and run, the team investigates whether the murder was tied to her career or her role as a foster mother to two brothers. Also, Lasalle grows increasingly concerned for his brother's welfare.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Rita Deveraux tells Pride that Douglas Hamilton is about to make a deal to get out of prison, Pride and the team rehash the Clearwater case in hopes of locating his mystery partner and spoiling his bargaining chip.Guests: Steven Weber, Stacy Keach, Chelsea Field..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a deadly armed robbery and high-speed chase is connected to an undercover ATF operation, Percy reconnects with her former ATF partner, Jake Roman.Guests: L. Steven Taylor..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Sebastian receives a plea for help from his high school friend after her business partner is killed at the Crescent City Gaming Convention. Also, a FBI special agent believes Adrian is a hacker the Cyber Crimes division has been tracking for years.Guests: Kristen Hager, Derek Webster..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A petty officer's murder leads the team to a family-owned night club where Pride's mother used to perform weekly. Also, Lasalle must urgently return home to Alabama after receiving an unexpected call from his family.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a petty officer who was in town to help a refugee family being recruited by terrorists. Also, Wade works on the special election campaign for Mayor Zahra Taylor that takes place during Mardi Gras.Guests: Amanda Warren..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: FBI Special Agent Raymond Isler asks Pride for help with an off-the-books opioids theft investigation he is personally invested in. Also, Percy is sent undercover as a getaway driver with Isler as the muscle for a job tied to the case.Guests: Derek Webster..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS investigates the disappearance of a congressional aide after a hitman saves her from two men posing as NCIS agents. Also, Lasalle struggles with life-altering decisions regarding his brother's future.
